DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy and acceptability of two new artificial tears following two weeks of treatment in patients with dry eye. Patients will be randomized to 1 of 2 treatments for 7 days then crossover to the alternate treatment for 7 days.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Acceptability of Two Lubricant Eye Drops
DOC.criteria: Male or Female At least 18 years of age Current use of artificial tears Any uncontrolled systemic disease Pregnancy or planning a pregnancy Contact lens wear
